pkgmetadata.longdescription: Miscellaneous Basic Statistical Functions // A collection of miscellaneous statistical functions for probability distributions: 'dbern', 'pbern', 'qbern', 'rbern' for the Bernoulli distribution, and 'distr2name', 'name2distr' for distribution names; probability density estimation ('densityfun'); most frequent value estimation ('mfv', 'mfv1'); calculation of the Hellinger distance ('hellinger'); use of classical kernels ('kernelfun', 'kernel_properties').
